replies.msg:
啱唔哂，日耳曼部落係源自北歐，後來擴展到中歐、東歐一帶，後世史學家都會分佢哋做三個支系，北、東、西，但東日耳曼就最早收皮，而家已經冇存活嘅東日耳曼語系，日耳曼神系唔係嚟自維京，之所以被冠名為「北歐神話」係因為呢啲神得返北日耳曼人喺嗰個年代仲信緊

西日耳曼部落形成嘅時候就已經落腳喺現今荷比盧三國左近啦，羅馬人撤出不列顛後，島上嘅羅馬化凱爾特人（不列顛人）因為冇咗羅馬人嘅軍力防備，時常面對北方武德充沛嘅凱爾特部落同皮克特人侵略好難應付到，所以不列顛人就邀請聚居喺西北歐嘅西日耳曼部落渡過海峽迎擊北佬，分別係盎格魯、撒克遜、朱特、弗里西

日耳曼武士集團猛力將皮克特人等等嘅北佬擊退返哈德良長城北面，不列顛人高興冇耐就後悔，因為呢啲日耳曼戰士搞事，弗里西人打家劫舍之後掠奪財寶返歐洲大陸，其他三族仲直接原地建立好多個國，而且分批由信奉日耳曼神系改宗信奉基督教，唔計小國嘅話大抵有七個，後世叫呢堆移民國家做英格蘭嘅「盎格魯撒克遜」時代

盎：諾森布里亞、麥西亞、東盎格里亞
撒：東、西、南撒克遜
朱：肯特王國

「維京人」其實就係一部份北日耳曼部落周不時會喺北海沿岸掠奪嘅海民，本身呢個詞唔係維京人自稱，而係盎格魯撒克遜人對呢啲海盜嘅蔑稱，可能北日耳曼人仲未改信耶穌、依然膜拜血腥神系嘅原因，喺掠奪不列顛島期間嗰種殘暴性質壓過英格蘭人嘅勇氣，同樣係日耳曼人嘅移民後裔為「遠親」信奉異教感到不齒、恐懼，二三百年前係掠奪者嘅角色喺八世紀嘅後代體會到當年不列顛人有乜嘢感受，呢啲維京人武力竊國，七大國之中已經有一兩個俾維京人奪取咗

但唔係所有北歐人都係維京人，首先芬蘭人唔係日耳曼人，仲要唔係源自印歐語系嘅文化，另外瓦良格人都係北日耳曼部落，大概而家瑞典嗰帶，但北海唔係佢哋嘅主要戰場，佢哋最大嘅戰績就係喺維京人往西燒殺擄掠嘅時候，瓦良格人往東、建立以斯拉夫人為主體嘅羅斯國，瓦良格人本質都係日耳曼文化衍生出嚟，可以話係陸地版嘅維京人

締造屬於自己的
維京傳奇
化身一名被培育成無畏戰士的維京劫掠者「埃沃爾」，帶領你的氏族從挪威冰冷荒野前往九世紀英格蘭茂密農田交織的新家園。建立你的聚落，不擇手段征服這片敵人的土地，在英靈殿爭取一席之地。

在維京時代，英格蘭是由低階貴族和相互敵對之王國組成的分裂國家。混亂的局勢下隱藏著一片未開發的沃土，等待著新的征服者入主。你會成為它的主人嗎？

寫下你的維京傳說
以進階 RPG 機制在全英格蘭開闢屬於你的道路。進行殘酷戰鬥、帶頭燒殺擄掠，或者運用策略並與其他領袖結盟來取得勝利。你在戰鬥和對話中做出的每個選擇都會讓你一步步成就豐功偉業。

領導史詩般的劫掠行動
帶領一群掠劫者，對撒克遜人軍隊和要塞發起閃電般的奇襲。為你的氏族奪取敵人土地的財富，將影響力擴張到蓬勃發展的聚落之外。

參與原汁原味的戰鬥
手持雙斧、長劍甚至盾牌對抗無情仇敵，展現維京戰士殘酷的戰鬥風格。採取近距離戰鬥將敵人斬首、以箭矢射穿對方，又或者使用你的袖劍進行刺殺。

發展你的聚落
氏族的新家園會隨著你的傳奇成長。藉由建造可升級的建築自訂聚落。設立軍營、鐵匠工坊、紋身店等建築以解鎖新功能和新任務。

分享你的自訂劫掠者
招募其他玩家精心設計的維京傭兵，或者創造並自訂自己的維京人後在線上分享。當他們在你朋友的遊戲世界與之並肩作戰時，你就能坐收獎勵。

手持雙斧、長劍甚至盾牌對抗無情仇敵，展現維京戰士殘酷的戰鬥風格。採取近距離戰鬥將敵人斬首、以箭矢射穿對方，又或者使用你的袖劍進行刺殺。

發展你的聚落
氏族的新家園會隨著你的傳奇成長。藉由建造可升級的建築自訂聚落。設立軍營、鐵匠工坊、紋身店等建築以解鎖新功能和新任務。

分享你的自訂劫掠者
招募其他玩家精心設計的維京傭兵，或者創造並自訂自己的維京人後在線上分享。當他們在你朋友的遊戲世界與之並肩作戰時，你就能坐收獎勵。

quote.msg:
https://www.ubisoft.com/zh-tw/game/assassins-creed/valhalla

締造屬於自己的
維京傳奇
化身一名被培育成無畏戰士的維京劫掠者「埃沃爾」，帶領你的氏族從挪威冰冷荒野前往九世紀英格蘭茂密農田交織的新家園。建立你的聚落，不擇手段征服這片敵人的土地，在英靈殿爭取一席之地。

在維京時代，英格蘭是由低階貴族和相互敵對之王國組成的分裂國家。混亂的局勢下隱藏著一片未開發的沃土，等待著新的征服者入主。你會成為它的主人嗎？

寫下你的維京傳說
以進階 RPG 機制在全英格蘭開闢屬於你的道路。進行殘酷戰鬥、帶頭燒殺擄掠，或者運用策略並與其他領袖結盟來取得勝利。你在戰鬥和對話中做出的每個選擇都會讓你一步步成就豐功偉業。

領導史詩般的劫掠行動
帶領一群掠劫者，對撒克遜人軍隊和要塞發起閃電般的奇襲。為你的氏族奪取敵人土地的財富，將影響力擴張到蓬勃發展的聚落之外。

參與原汁原味的戰鬥
手持雙斧、長劍甚至盾牌對抗無情仇敵，展現維京戰士殘酷的戰鬥風格。採取近距離戰鬥將敵人斬首、以箭矢射穿對方，又或者使用你的袖劍進行刺殺。

發展你的聚落
氏族的新家園會隨著你的傳奇成長。藉由建造可升級的建築自訂聚落。設立軍營、鐵匠工坊、紋身店等建築以解鎖新功能和新任務。

分享你的自訂劫掠者
招募其他玩家精心設計的維京傭兵，或者創造並自訂自己的維京人後在線上分享。當他們在你朋友的遊戲世界與之並肩作戰時，你就能坐收獎勵。

quote.msg:
https://www.ubisoft.com/zh-tw/game/assassins-creed/valhalla

締造屬於自己的
維京傳奇
化身一名被培育成無畏戰士的維京劫掠者「埃沃爾」，帶領你的氏族從挪威冰冷荒野前往九世紀英格蘭茂密農田交織的新家園。建立你的聚落，不擇手段征服這片敵人的土地，在英靈殿爭取一席之地。

在維京時代，英格蘭是由低階貴族和相互敵對之王國組成的分裂國家。混亂的局勢下隱藏著一片未開發的沃土，等待著新的征服者入主。你會成為它的主人嗎？

寫下你的維京傳說
以進階 RPG 機制在全英格蘭開闢屬於你的道路。進行殘酷戰鬥、帶頭燒殺擄掠，或者運用策略並與其他領袖結盟來取得勝利。你在戰鬥和對話中做出的每個選擇都會讓你一步步成就豐功偉業。

領導史詩般的劫掠行動
帶領一群掠劫者，對撒克遜人軍隊和要塞發起閃電般的奇襲。為你的氏族奪取敵人土地的財富，將影響力擴張到蓬勃發展的聚落之外。

參與原汁原味的戰鬥
手持雙斧、長劍甚至盾牌對抗無情仇敵，展現維京戰士殘酷的戰鬥風格。採取近距離戰鬥將敵人斬首、以箭矢射穿對方，又或者使用你的袖劍進行刺殺。

發展你的聚落
氏族的新家園會隨著你的傳奇成長。藉由建造可升級的建築自訂聚落。設立軍營、鐵匠工坊、紋身店等建築以解鎖新功能和新任務。

分享你的自訂劫掠者
招募其他玩家精心設計的維京傭兵，或者創造並自訂自己的維京人後在線上分享。當他們在你朋友的遊戲世界與之並肩作戰時，你就能坐收獎勵。

replies.msg: 其實梟雄二次大戰個一段仔都正過成隻game

最撚ON9就係奧德賽, 我唯一無玩就係隻垃圾奧德賽
我由第一集到埃及全部玩齊應該有資格講野啦
咩叫死忠, 我就係死忠喇, 死到竟然會罷買隻垃圾

新系統新玩法我接受無問題, 因為唔可以萬年唔變
但作為一個歷史人, 去玩一隻歷史遊戲
無啦啦要打美杜沙、米陶洛斯我都費閪事講
最令我火滾就係做乜撚野搞多重結局

屌你ON撚9, 本身聽到梟雄搞男女主角都燥燥地
但後來俾佢兜到, 因為男女主角係雙胞胎, 所以可以同時讀到兩個人DNA
兼且兩個人劇情唔一樣, 歷史事件上唔會有BUG

但隻奧德賽搞乜撚野
假如男女主角同名, 我都姑且當係歷史太過久遠, DNA殘缺讀唔到小明係男定女, 所以由電腦重組個人出黎

但依家唔撚係囉, 俾你揀男女主角根本成件事都無意義
玩女主角, 同一句對白蘇格拉底叫你MARY, 男主角就叫你阿TOM
搞撚到成件事柒撚哂, 男女主角為出而出, 對劇情無影響可有可無
啲劇情又學WITCHER玩蝴蝶效應
UBI係唔係唔記得自己整緊歷史遊戲呀

今次維京聽講男女主角同名, 所以男女主角問題就算喇
但如果今次維京又搞多重結局, 我以後唔撚再買AC玩

quote.msg: 維京人其實係乜人

Wiki係咪咁難
而家黎就係冰島人
冰島踢世界杯開波前都做過維京戰吼
北歐神話姐係雷神果堆都係來自維京

啱唔哂，日耳曼部落係源自北歐，後來擴展到中歐、東歐一帶，後世史學家都會分佢哋做三個支系，北、東、西，但東日耳曼就最早收皮，而家已經冇存活嘅東日耳曼語系，日耳曼神系唔係嚟自維京，之所以被冠名為「北歐神話」係因為呢啲神得返北日耳曼人喺嗰個年代仲信緊

西日耳曼部落形成嘅時候就已經落腳喺現今荷比盧三國左近啦，羅馬人撤出不列顛後，島上嘅羅馬化凱爾特人（不列顛人）因為冇咗羅馬人嘅軍力防備，時常面對北方武德充沛嘅凱爾特部落同皮克特人侵略好難應付到，所以不列顛人就邀請聚居喺西北歐嘅西日耳曼部落渡過海峽迎擊北佬，分別係盎格魯、撒克遜、朱特、弗里西

日耳曼武士集團猛力將皮克特人等等嘅北佬擊退返哈德良長城北面，不列顛人高興冇耐就後悔，因為呢啲日耳曼戰士搞事，弗里西人打家劫舍之後掠奪財寶返歐洲大陸，其他三族仲直接原地建立好多個國，而且分批由信奉日耳曼神系改宗信奉基督教，唔計小國嘅話大抵有七個，後世叫呢堆移民國家做英格蘭嘅「盎格魯撒克遜」時代

盎：諾森布里亞、麥西亞、東盎格里亞
撒：東、西、南撒克遜
朱：肯特王國

「維京人」其實就係一部份北日耳曼部落周不時會喺北海沿岸掠奪嘅海民，本身呢個詞唔係維京人自稱，而係盎格魯撒克遜人對呢啲海盜嘅蔑稱，可能北日耳曼人仲未改信耶穌、依然膜拜血腥神系嘅原因，喺掠奪不列顛島期間嗰種殘暴性質壓過英格蘭人嘅勇氣，同樣係日耳曼人嘅移民後裔為「遠親」信奉異教感到不齒、恐懼，二三百年前係掠奪者嘅角色喺八世紀嘅後代體會到當年不列顛人有乜嘢感受，呢啲維京人武力竊國，七大國之中已經有一兩個俾維京人奪取咗

但唔係所有北歐人都係維京人，首先芬蘭人唔係日耳曼人，仲要唔係源自印歐語系嘅文化，另外瓦良格人都係北日耳曼部落，大概而家瑞典嗰帶，但北海唔係佢哋嘅主要戰場，佢哋最大嘅戰績就係喺維京人往西燒殺擄掠嘅時候，瓦良格人往東、建立以斯拉夫人為主體嘅羅斯國，瓦良格人本質都係日耳曼文化衍生出嚟，可以話係陸地版嘅維京人

replies.msg: AC一路都係科幻game喎

INFOS ABOUT AC VALHALLA:

1. Eivor is pronounced “Ā-vōr.”

2. You can choose whether your Eivor is male or female.

3. Customization options let you change Eivor’s hair, clothing, war paint, and more.

4. The game takes place in Norway and England.

5. England has three major cities to visit: London, Winchester, and Jórvík.

6. You can dual-wield almost any combination of weapons.

7. Every piece of gear is unique.

8. Gear can be upgraded and customized, and you can use the same equipment from beginning to end if you want to.

9. You earn new abilities through a system mechanically similar to a skill tree.

10. What you can accomplish is more about gear and skills, not character levels.

11. Words the team have used to describe combat include “brutal,” “crunchy,” and “weighty.”

12. The team is putting extra effort toward enemy variety to keep encounters surprising.

13. You have a longship you use to go on raids.

14. Your longship has a crew, including warriors you can customize.

15. Assaults are big setpiece moments. They are different from raids, and involve attacks on large fortifications.

16. You build a settlement that serves as your base.

17. Your clan and others you recruit live in your settlement.

18. Hidden Ones and Order of Ancients (a.k.a. Assassins and Templars) are in the game.

19. At some point, Eivor meets Assassins, works alongside them, and uses a hidden blade.

20. King Aelfred of Wessex (later known as Alfred the Great) is an antagonistic figure.

21. Layla’s story in the present day continues.

22. Ubisoft Montreal is leading development on Valhalla. The studio’s last two Assassin’s Creed games were Origins and Black Flag.

23. Twelve other Ubisoft Studios are supporting Valhalla’s development, along with external partner Sperasoft.

24. Valhalla is a cross-gen game, coming to the PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X alongside currently available platforms.

25. The game will release during the 2020 holiday season.

但黑旗你睇得出佢想寫群像劇寫埋其他人結果係冇一個印象叫深
加埋一個任務之間你往往要打幾次船搞到講故事講到肢離破碎

之後叛變問題係短轉變突然左少少但個劇本總體反而方向仲叫可以

quote.msg:
你覺得EZIO好因為佢用左三集寫一個人好難唔掂
（唔信你再諗下除左EZIO你仲對邊幾個有深印象）
而且本質上只係一個復仇加覺悟既故事咁大路係好難寫得柒

但佢編劇同講故事能力本來就唔係好個堆
之後AC3開始想將個故事提高個境界變成理念衝突開始寫唔掂出哂事
黑旗愛德華篇幅多都仲叫OK少少叫企得住個人物
但黑旗你睇得出佢想寫群像劇寫埋其他人結果係冇一個印象叫深
加埋一個任務之間你往往要打幾次船搞到講故事講到肢離破碎

之後叛變問題係短轉變突然左少少但個劇本總體反而方向仲叫可以
巴黎倫敦雙城記劇本同演出都係鳩提都費事提

origin其實點解仲OK因為佢又係走番EZIO條大路公式加埋演出仲叫好少少
但問題壓級搞到你得閒要去清下支線問號又變到斷開一斷斷
odyssey一個平淡既故事加埋完全唔掂演出掂先奇啦

的確係
由一個黃毛小子mk仔， 睇佢成長慢慢轉變為一位刺客大宗師
其他角色真係完全冇乜印象
同埋最主要係佢講故事嘅功力好差
有好多遊戲嘅故事都係普普通通
但係講故事敘事技巧人物描寫搞得好就成為一個經典
其實刺客二就係一個比較好嘅例子
由2 死mk玩到Revelation 變咗呀伯

So I'll give some insights on AC valhalla, so people will atleast stop the hate and I hope some will get excited.

The game's creative director was Ashraf Ismail, who handled both black flag and origins. And according to his latest podcast, he will try to tie up the lore from the old games to the before the conception of the assassin's timeline which he pioneered. So atleast we slowly get back to the game's roots which made me optimistic with the game's direction

信住先

Also to those people who is confused on how vikings seems very un-assassin like, Ashraf explained that the main character starts as a viking and somehow tied with the assassin group since both vikings and assassins have common enemy, Eivor will eventually become a full fledged assassin late in the game or at the end.

好正路

With regards with the RPG system, the leveling up seems to use something like the elder scrolls system where, your skill tree will level up the more you will use them for example if you primarily use assassination skills its the only tree that will level up.

即係今次係要不停練技？

Settlements comes back so if you miss the villa mechanics in AC brotherhood, they bring something like that in Valhalla...in addition you will have a mercenary system which can you can somehow customize the appearance and tattoos

AC3 Homestead

replies.msg:
everything i know about ac valhalla
the character you will be playing as is called eivor who can be either a male or a female according to your choice..you can customize eivors hair,beard,tattos and facepaint..you can also customize your weapons and gears add rune to enhance them...
there will be a tons of different types of weapons and each of them will be unique in its own way..you wont be getting an item twice via looting and you can double weild any type of weapons like swords,axes,maces,long shields,small shields,bows and arrows, spears and a lot more
the story will take place in 9th century where your people come from the frozen ground of norway to a much warmer place of england(already controlled by the templars) looking for settlements.you will a have a home base like ac 2 but in a larger scale..which you can upgrade and customize as you progress through the game via all the plundering..you can also interact with you shipmates and other people who might give you some sidequests.. you can also play dice,drink battles,do some fishing and hunting and viking rap battles,,you can also add statues,trees and there will also be a tatoo shop in you main settlement

the longboats wil be used more as a travelling material than naval combat..upgrading it will allow you to take more damage before you can board on the or forts or other settlements and will also allow you to recruit more shipmates who will play a big role for boarding unlike oddyssey where they just stand still and do nothing
the norse mythology wont play a big role in the main campaign story.. but there will some of them in some side quests,,but larger portion of it will be in the dlc ..so better watch your pocket i you love the norse mythology
you choices will play a bigger role in the ongoing storyline especially the ones where you forge aliies with other viking clans,,you can be the eivor you want to be unlike oddyssey where choices doesnt have that much impact on the storyline..there will be romance options as well which is also on a larger scale than oddyssey
you can mount horses, wolfs and other types of animals
according to ashraf when eivor joined the assassins they gave him a hidden blade and demonstrated how it is used..then eivor said them its a cool weapon and will come in handy during battles so why should i keep it hidden when i can weild it on my hand plus i like my fingers and want to keep them
there will be different types of villains..like when you will be level 25 you will still face new types of villains who are more brutal and agile will require new tactics if you wanna beat them..plus social stealth is back and there will be a skill tree system to enhance your fighting skill..you raven wiil also have diiferent skillset and different types of cameos

改咗喇
https://www.gamespot.com/articles/assassins-creed-valhalla-wont-have-a-traditional-l/1100-6476693/
Assassin's Creed Origins and its sequel, Odyssey, both redefined the Assassin's Creed formula by introducing more role-playing elements into their open-world adventures. This included standard level progression, determining what gear you could equip, what enemies would give you a harder time, and more. With Assassin's Creed Valhalla, that won't be the case anymore.
Assassin's Creed Valhalla creative director, Ashraf Ismail, has explained that Valhalla prioritizes power over numerical levels, which takes into account the skills you've unlocked and the gear you've equipped over a linearly increasing number.
Speaking to Game Informer, he added, "As part of our fresh take on the RPG elements and progression, I would say it's less about levels and it’s more about the sense of power. Based on the skills you have, you gain power. That's how we look at that mechanism in the world; it's really about your capacities and what you can do."

He adds that there will still be a number attributed to this power value, but that it won't be influenced in the same way as both Origins and Odyssey. "It's a sense of power rather than levels," he concluded.

quote.msg:
改咗喇
https://www.gamespot.com/articles/assassins-creed-valhalla-wont-have-a-traditional-l/1100-6476693/
Assassin's Creed Origins and its sequel, Odyssey, both redefined the Assassin's Creed formula by introducing more role-playing elements into their open-world adventures. This included standard level progression, determining what gear you could equip, what enemies would give you a harder time, and more. With Assassin's Creed Valhalla, that won't be the case anymore.
Assassin's Creed Valhalla creative director, Ashraf Ismail, has explained that Valhalla prioritizes power over numerical levels, which takes into account the skills you've unlocked and the gear you've equipped over a linearly increasing number.
Speaking to Game Informer, he added, "As part of our fresh take on the RPG elements and progression, I would say it's less about levels and it’s more about the sense of power. Based on the skills you have, you gain power. That's how we look at that mechanism in the world; it's really about your capacities and what you can do."

He adds that there will still be a number attributed to this power value, but that it won't be influenced in the same way as both Origins and Odyssey. "It's a sense of power rather than levels," he concluded.

應該唔會再有打一下扣5千既RPG 模式喇
佢似話唔咁限lv多D咋喎

Do the enemies have defined numerical levels? And does the player?

As part of our fresh take on the RPG elements and progression, I would say it’s less about levels and it’s more about the sense of power. Based on the skills you have, you gain power. That’s how we look at that mechanism in the world; it’s really about your capacities and what you can do. Yes, there is a rating that is given, which encompasses at some point your gear as well. But it’s really about the skills you’ve learned, what you can do, and that value is rated. So it’s a sense of power rather than levels.
